title: Realme GT Neo 3 leaks reveal three cameras and 6.7-inch AMOLED screen
content:
The Realme GT Neo series is one of many budget flagships produced by Realme, and the second generation only arrived a few months ago in India. It seems another model might be on the way, as renders for the Realme GT Neo 3 have now been released. Steve Hemmerstoffer (also known as OnLeaks), a notable

The post Realme GT Neo 3 leaks reveal three cameras and 6.7-inch AMOLED screen appeared first on xda-developers.
description: One of Realme's upcoming budget flagship phones, the Relame GT Neo 3, has been leaked by multiple sources.
